title: New: Twin Shadow – To The Top
content:
For those of you that missed it, Twin Shadow jumped on the GTA V soundtrack last year with the excellent Old Love/New Love, and in the process, he set the bar pretty high for melancholic, beat-driven dance tunes. This time he’s back with the anthemic To The Top, which could be as close to an ’80s power ballad as you’ll get this year.

To The Top is a free download, so jump on that. Word is, he’s also currently spending time in the studio working on the follow up to Confess. It’s time to get excited.

(via Pitchfork)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d23
